QuestData.Title: Zen'Aliri
QuestData.Description: You've already met one of my new students, the young worgen named Garl. My other student is a troll by the name of Zen'Aliri. He currently camps with the explorers of Marshal's Expedition, to the west of here.$b$bTake these results to him, $n, and tell him to read them well.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Zen'Aliri in Marshal's Stand.
